channel.title: Alerts and Reports :: Learn With Shantanu
channel.description: Alerts and Reports With Superset Note Chromium headless or firefox is necessary to get alerts and reports running as expected as well Celery Redis Should be installed and configured. We have documentation you can refer to [Chromium Configuration] and [apache-superset/configuration/celery-workers--beat/] Thank you! To get Alerts and reports working. We need SMTP creds, and chrome or firefox should be installed. For this tutorial I am using chrome. In Superset Config file i.
